short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jumps straight to a recipe section of a webpage (if it exists), skipping past all the unneccesary fluff

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will search for a recipe box on the page and skip straight to it, avoiding all the unnecessary preamble about the author's partner's favorite autumn solstice snack or whatever. 

Note: This tends to work better on personal recipe sites that contain lots of text and pictures (i.e. "fluff"). It likely won't work on dedicated recipe pages like Food Network or Serious Eats, but the recipe is generally pretty upfront anyway so it shouldn't be too much of a hassle.

Secondary Note: This is my first extension so if you find any bugs, please be sure to send me a message so I can fix them!
